title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.177 - Inpatient admission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.177 - Inpatient admission

State Regulations

The formal acceptance by a health facility of a patient
who is to be provided with room, board, and continuous nursing service in an
area of the health facility where patients generally stay at least
overnight. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.177

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
